body_html:
Just wanted to ping this PR with an acknowledgement. We'll be working on this PR with Gunan's offline suggestions:

  • rename from tf_cuda* to tf_gpu*
  • tf_cuda* must remain operational
  • create new tf_cuda* rules that simply call tf_gpu* rules

(and over time, work on moving all tf_cuda* rules to the new tf_gpu* rules slowly without breaking anything)

body:
Just wanted to ping this PR with an acknowledgement.  We'll be working on this PR with Gunan's offline suggestions: 
- rename from tf_cuda* to tf_gpu*
- tf_cuda* must remain operational
- create new tf_cuda* rules that simply call tf_gpu* rules

(and over time, work on moving all tf_cuda* rules to the new tf_gpu* rules slowly without breaking anything)
